overview: When Chadder stows away on a ship, he can't imagine the wild journey he's in for! Grumpy Captain Bleagh and quiet first mate Leo are searching for the lost island of Anderon...but their map seems to be missing the directions. When the crazy crew bumps into a mysterious sailor, the silly antics have just begun. Will Chadder ever make it as a ship's cook? Will the crew find the lost island of Anderon? How can God's Word guide Chadder through this wild adventure? See what's in store for Chadder and his crew!
tagline: Join Chadder Chipmunk on a vast voyage!
title: Chadder's High Seas Adventure
